price: "Kõ kuma bã nĩ ne mafĩfĩci ba daga wannan wanda yake shĩ wulakantacce ne kuma bã ya iya bayyanawar magana sai da ƙyar?
arabic: أَمۡ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي هُوَ مَهِينٞ وَلَا يَكَادُ يُبِينُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: am anā khayrun min hādhā alladhī huwa mahīnun walā yakādu yubīnu
